explains: n. [建] 窗台；[建] 窗沿

sentences.en: My belt buckle slips inside the windowsill.
sentences.cn: 我的皮带扣滑到窗沿里面了。

sentences.en: As you can see in the photo, a group of mallards lives under the windowsill of a bank office in Spokane, Washington.
sentences.cn: 正如你在照片里看到的，华盛顿州斯波坎市一家银行办公室的窗台下面，生活着一群绿头鸭。

sentences.en: I would line up my toys on this windowsill and play.
sentences.cn: 我要把玩具在这个窗台上排成一行来玩。
